item.title: Savory Green Gram Crepe / Moong Dal Dosa / Pesarattu
item.description: Moong Dal Dosa are thin crepes made with Whole Moong Dal and spices. These protein packed flavorful moong dal dosa has all the important ingredients, which a breakfast requires - healthy, tasty and quick meal that you can put together. It is similar in flavor and presentation to traditional dosas but donâ€™t require fermenting. Preparation Take 1 cup Green Whole Moong and soak it in water for minimum 5-6 hours.
